metadata.title: CVE-2024-2756 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
__Host-/__Secure- cookie bypass due to partial CVE-2022-31629 fix

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-2756` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libapache2-mod-php7.0 - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm9
libphp7.0-embed - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm9

criterions.comment: php7.0 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm9').
